General.Name: Chijet Motor Company, Inc. Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Chijet Motor Company, Inc. engages in the design and development, production, sale, and after-sale service new energy vehicles and vehicle parts. in China. The company offers passenger vehicles, including small cars, sedans, and sports utility vehicles; and commercial vehicles, such as light trucks and vans. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Yantai, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 8, Beijing South Road, Yantai, China, 37 264006
